column4: Does anyone know if I can do a clean Windows install on a new partition, then copy the files into the .wine directory (into their correct dirs) and be able to run programs better in Wine?
You wouldn't have the necessary registry entries
your best bet is always to run through the installation so the WINE registry is configured appropriately

I don't really understand what you hope to accomplish by that. Windows is an island that tries at every turn to prevent ships from coming to port. Linux + Samba + WINE try every way in the world to get around these limitations
